title: Palestinian envoy visits NPC, extended gratitude for Pakistan’s support
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 25 (APP): Palestinian Ambassador, Dr. Zuhair Zahid, on Wednesday, visited the National Press Club (NPC) and extended his gratitude to the government and Pakistani people for their unwavering support to the people of Palestine.
During the visit, a detailed meeting was held with NPC leadership, including President Azhar Jatoi, Secretary Nayyer Ali and others, said a press release.
While speaking on the occasion, he said both the countries were enjoying brotherly and durable relations.
He thanked the NPC for inviting him to the club, saying Pakistan is the second home for Palestinians.
During the meeting, a briefing about club’s operations and activities was given to the guests.
